## Reglas principales de integración

### 1. Integral indefinida {.unnumbered}

Si $F'(x) = f(x)$, entonces:
$$\int f(x) \, dx = F(x) + C$$

### 2. Integrales inmediatas {.unnumbered}

::: {.panel-tabset}

## Potencias y logaritmo

$$\int x^n \, dx = \frac{x^{n+1}}{n+1} + C \quad (n \neq -1)$$

$$\int \frac{1}{x} \, dx = \ln|x| + C$$

## Exponencial

$$\int e^x \, dx = e^x + C$$

$$\int a^x \, dx = \frac{a^x}{\ln a} + C \quad (a > 0, a \neq 1)$$

## Trigonométricas

$$\int \operatorname{sen} x \, dx = -\cos x + C$$

$$\int \cos x \, dx = \operatorname{sen} x + C$$

$$\int \operatorname{tg} x \, dx = -\ln|\cos x| + C$$

$$\int \operatorname{cotg} x \, dx = \ln|\operatorname{sen} x| + C$$

$$\int \sec x \, dx = \ln|\sec x + \operatorname{tg} x| + C$$

$$\int \csc x \, dx = \ln|\csc x - \operatorname{cotg} x| + C$$

## Trigonométricas inversas

$$\int \frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^2}} \, dx = \operatorname{arcsen} x + C$$

$$\int \frac{1}{1+x^2} \, dx = \operatorname{arctg} x + C$$

$$\int \frac{1}{x\sqrt{x^2-1}} \, dx = \operatorname{arcsec} |x| + C$$

:::

### 3. Método de sustitución {.unnumbered}

Si $u = g(x)$, entonces:
$$\int f(g(x))g'(x) \, dx = \int f(u) \, du$$

### 4. Integración por partes {.unnumbered}

$$\int u \, dv = uv - \int v \, du$$

o equivalentemente:
$$\int u(x)v'(x) \, dx = u(x)v(x) - \int u'(x)v(x) \, dx$$

### 5. Fracciones racionales {.unnumbered}

Para integrar $\frac{P(x)}{Q(x)}$ donde $P$ y $Q$ son polinomios:

1. Si grado de $P \geq$ grado de $Q$: dividir primero
2. Descomponer en fracciones simples
3. Integrar cada fracción simple

::: {.callout-tip}
## Descomposición en fracciones simples

- Para $(x-a)^n$: términos $\frac{A_1}{x-a} + \frac{A_2}{(x-a)^2} + \cdots + \frac{A_n}{(x-a)^n}$

- Para $x^2 + bx + c$ irreducible: término $\frac{Ax + B}{x^2 + bx + c}$
:::

### Tabla de integrales útiles {.unnumbered}

| Integral | Resultado |
|----------|-----------|
| $\displaystyle\int \frac{1}{a^2+x^2} \, dx$ | $\displaystyle\frac{1}{a}\operatorname{arctg}\frac{x}{a} + C$ |
| $\displaystyle\int \frac{1}{\sqrt{a^2-x^2}} \, dx$ | $\displaystyle\operatorname{arcsen}\frac{x}{a} + C$ |
| $\displaystyle\int \frac{1}{a^2-x^2} \, dx$ | $\displaystyle\frac{1}{2a}\ln\left|\frac{a+x}{a-x}\right| + C$ |
| $\displaystyle\int \frac{1}{\sqrt{x^2 \pm a^2}} \, dx$ | $\displaystyle\ln|x + \sqrt{x^2 \pm a^2}| + C$ |
| $\displaystyle\int \sqrt{a^2-x^2} \, dx$ | $\displaystyle\frac{x}{2}\sqrt{a^2-x^2} + \frac{a^2}{2}\operatorname{arcsen}\frac{x}{a} + C$ |

::: {.callout-note}
